segments.text: I see the light coming in from the window, brightening the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks content, focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got that apron on, like a classic mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flowing over, but maybe she'll notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor catches the sun nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids are being adventurous with the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching so high for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It shakes a little, adds to the excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, sharing with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, perfect backdrop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how they're having fun without worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the water might cause a little slip, it's okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Makes me smile seeing their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
